natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer
Class DepTreeTransformer

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer.DepTreeTransformer
public class DepTreeTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

DepTreeTransformator performs operations on a RSDepTreeModel, such as removing and adding nodes. It has a root and a current, on which all operations take place.

Constructor Summary
DepTreeTransformer()
          Constructs an empty DepTreeTransformer
DepTreeTransformer(RSDepTreeModel deptree)
          Constructs a DepTreeTransformer by setting the RSDepTreeModel
